forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning becoming less numerous during the afternoon hours. Thunder possible. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early becoming more intermittent for the afternoon. Thunder possible. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 11C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 52F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 62F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the evening becoming a steady rain overnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening becoming a steady rain overnight. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
